location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 150mm x 320 mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a track in Luristan as it crosses a river and indicates vegetation, contours as well as the route taken by the advanced party of the 39th Central India Horse and the line of retreat of the tribesmen.The map was produced by Major A M Kettlewell to illustrate his 'Report of an attack on a party of the 39th Central India Horse on the 11th December 1912. Resulting in the death of Captain A. B. Eckford' (Delhi, Superintendent Government Printing, Delhi, 1913).
